title.rendered: “IDF Intercepts Hostile Aerial Target Over Metula: No Injuries Reported”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Documentation; Air defense fighters intercepted a suspicious aerial target in the Metula area.

Following the alert regarding the incursion of hostile aircraft activated in northern Israel, air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target in the Metula area that crossed from Lebanon.

Shortly thereafter, another alert was activated in northern Israel, during which an interceptor was launched at a suspicious aerial target that crossed into the country’s territory from Lebanon; the incident concluded.

Alerts for rocket and missile fire were activated due to concerns about debris from the interception.

There were no damages or injuries in any of the incidents.

Attached is documentation of the target interception: https://bit.ly/3yVKGhT
